summary: After being disowned by her family, an awkward librarian relies on the help of her brooding neighbour.
cast: Harshvardhan Rane|Mawra Hocane|Vijay Raaz|Murli Sharma|Manish Chaudhary|Annurag Sinha|Sudesh Berry|Pyomori Mehta|Shradha Das|Rushad Rana|Pawan Singh|Alok Pandey|Divyetta Kaveri|Sunil Dutt|Ashoka|Kareem Hajee|Ripu Daman Singh|Kunal Punjwani|Sonal Kedia|Ravi Asopa|Kamal Adib|Sanyukta Timsina|Aditi Shetty|Ujjwala Raut|Ambika Soni|Payal Bhasin|Richita Soni|Utkarsha Parikh|Diksha Rana|Karim Hajee|Shaleeni Ranchhod|Pawan Singh|Jitendra Barsiwal
title: Sanam Teri Kasam
